description: From un- +‎ kingly (adverb via Middle English unkyngly).

adjectives.description: unkingly (comparative more unkingly, superlative most unkingly)

examples: […]  yet a people is also of God, a part of God, and they may uncrown him, destroy him and cast him forth if he act unkingly.

entries.meaning: In an unkingly manner; not befitting a king.
